function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Prolonged discussions with doctors","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through close individual interactions within service smes.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Relocation decisions based on anticipated access requirements of customers may increase the risk of disease spread.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of agility and adaptability in coping with crisis times may lead to increased vulnerability to contagious disease outbreaks.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Utilizing artificial intelligence and image processing technology for medical diagnosis","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Having informal close relationships and provision of reaching them for overcoming potential future financial constraints","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Value co-creation is broadened to the service network to include other stakeholders such as their competitors","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Service smes’ relationship building and process-enabling capabilities are critical for survival and sustainability in disruptive service conditions.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Strategic sensitivity is a critical capability for service smes, particularly in anticipation and understanding of pandemic and post-pandemic conditions.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Flexibility in reshaping businesses and empowering other parties to shape the nature or process of service provision is essential for service smes.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Forced closures of service businesses","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High demand for certain services beyond capacity","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased risk of contagion due to social isolation and increased indoor activities like cooking and baking together with children.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inefficient diagnostic procedures and increased pressure on health-care services.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mutual interaction becoming more vital during the pandemic period","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Psychological burden due to negative experiences during the pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty and worry among actors in the service ecosystem","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Encouraging physical activities for children using basic household items may increase the risk of spreading contagious diseases if proper hygiene and sanitation measures are not followed","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Idle employees in the real estate business during the pandemic may lead to increased risk of viral transmission if proper safety measures are not followed","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of synchronization in service processes between partners may lead to miscommunication and an increased risk of inefficiency, potentially impacting the delivery of services and public health","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased consumption of unhealthy food due to lifestyle changes during the pandemic.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of access to safe and healthy food options.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on eating out and lack of cooking skills among consumers.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Open access classes for children may increase the risk of contagion in the community.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Continuing indoor activities without appropriate safety measures may lead to a higher risk of contagion.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sharing information and interacting closely with competitors may lead to the transmission of contagious diseases if proper precautions are not taken.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of ethical interaction capability in service smes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Relational interactions during the pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Nonopportunistic processes between actors in smes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Relational interaction capability may lead to close physical contact between businesses and customers.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Close interaction and co-creation may lead to increased risk of contagious diseases transmission.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of customer needs identification","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate understanding of latent customer needs","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited access to financial support during covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on personal networks for financial support","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependency on external networks for technical knowledge","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Rapid transfer of resources particularly human resources and technical skills from one project to another","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Change in customer expectations and service requirements due to pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decoupling of service offerings to adapt to new customer requirements","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Direct interactions with employees and customers can facilitate the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Allowing employees to use company resources for personal work and experimentation may lead to unhygienic conditions and increased risk of disease transmission.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Rapid deployment of resources and reconfiguration of business systems may lead to oversight of health and safety measures, increasing the risk of disease spread.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of remote patient inspection and consulting capability","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Closure of fitness centers","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Food safety concerns and business model challenges","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Managers not providing complete understanding of agility capabilities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of strategic sensitivity in service smes","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of focus on digitalization-related changes","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High risk of contagion in a closed fitness studio environment","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate capacity for remote service delivery","category":"Society","confidence":"High"}]}
